Detailed Description

template<typename VarArray, typename Index, typename Result>
struct ElementConstraintDynamic< VarArray, Index, Result >

constraints;watchelement_one Description This constraint is identical to watchelement, except the vector is indexed from 1 rather than from 0. constraints;watchelement_one References See entry

help constraints watchelement

for details of watchelement which watchelement_one is based on. constraints;watchelement Description The constraint

watchelement(vec, i, e)

specifies that, in any solution, vec[i] = e and i is in the range [0 .. |vec|-1]. constraints;watchelement Notes Enforces generalised arc consistency. constraints;watchelement References See entry

help constraints element

for details of an identical constraint that enforces a lower level of consistency.

Defines the number of dynamic triggers the constraint wants. Must be implemented by any constraint.

Definition at line 332 of file dynamic_element.h.

template<typename VarArray, typename Index, typename Result>
virtual bool ElementConstraintDynamic< VarArray, Index, Result >::get_satisfying_assignment ( box< pair< int, DomainInt > > &  assignment  )  [inline, virtual]

Looks for a valid partial assignment to a constraint.

The return value (in the box) is pairs of <varnum, domain value>, where varnum is in the same position as returned by get_vars.

Reimplemented from AbstractConstraint.
